abstract: The leading steel industry group in China has come out against a joint venture consolidating iron ore assets of BHP Billiton and Rio Tinto in Australia.
snippet: The leading steel industry group in China has come out against a joint venture consolidating iron ore assets of BHP Billiton and Rio Tinto in Australia.
lead_paragraph: The leading steel industry group in China has come out against a joint venture consolidating iron ore assets of BHP Billiton and Rio Tinto in Australia, the influential Caijing Magazine reported.

headline.main: Chinese Steel Group Opposes BHP-Rio Deal
